hero.title: Digital
hero.description: Zonda brings together your patients' medical records in one place, integrating clinical workflows and AI-assisted documentation, for more prepared appointments and safer clinical decisions.

workflowBenefits.title: Improve care for your patients and treat them with confidence
workflowBenefits.subtitle: Professionals prepared for each consultation, with the complete patient history available at a glance. Make faster and safer decisions with integrated prescription assistance and clinical alerts. Manage treatments, notes and letters from one place.

startPrepared.title: Start each appointment prepared
startPrepared.description: See your patient's complete medical history instantly. Access patient summaries, treatment history and pre-consultation questionnaires in one view. Get the information you need to provide quality care from the first minute.

regainTime.title: Regain time after consultations
regainTime.description: Use our AI medical scribe integration to instantly transcribe your consultations into medically structured notes. Spend less time writing, more time treating patients and still finish on time.

treatFollowUp.title: Treat and follow up in one place
treatFollowUp.description: Prescribe with confidence. Make safer and faster decisions with integrated clinical decision support in your consultation notes. Order labs, prescriptions and refer patients without leaving your Digital Medical Record.

standardizeCare.title: Standardize care in your practice
standardizeCare.description: Your care, your way. Use specialty-specific consultation templates to ensure every clinician follows best practices. Generate compliance-ready reports in minutes. Maintain clinical governance without extra administration.

keepConnected.title: Keep care connected between teams
keepConnected.description: Whether you're an independent professional or work on a multidisciplinary team, Zonda helps your team coordinate care. Share care plans, test results and referral letters securely from one system.

completeHistory.title: Complete Patient History

unstructuredInput.title: Natural Input Processing
unstructuredInput.description: Zonda doesn't require structured input — healthcare professionals can add notes in any format, and Zonda understands, structures and records automatically.

earlyAlerts.title: Early Health Alerts
earlyAlerts.description: Intelligent monitoring that detects patterns and changes in patient health, providing timely alerts for proactive care.

seamlessWorkflow.title: Seamless Workflow

intelligentProcessing.title: Intelligent Medical Documentation

naturalLanguage.title: Natural Language Understanding

automaticStructuring.title: Automatic Structuring

contextualAnalysis.title: Contextual Analysis
contextualAnalysis.description: Analyzes medical information in context, identifying relationships and patterns for better clinical insights.

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: The system improves over time, learning from patterns and adapting to your specific medical practice and terminology.

healthSurveys.title: Health Surveys
